tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_maintenance (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(100),
  last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history ( 
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    equipment_id INT, 
    maintenance_date DATE, 
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50), 
    technician_name VARCHAR(100) 
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
 equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 serial_number INT UNIQUE,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 model VARCHAR(255),
 purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
 schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 equipment_id INT,
 maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
 frequency INT,
 last_maintenance_date DATE,
 next_maintenance_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
 history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 schedule_id INT,
 maintenance_date DATE,
 technician VARCHAR(255),
 maintenance_notes TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(schedule_id)
)

CREATE TABLE technician (
 technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 specialty VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE robots (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    maintenance_schedule INT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    robot_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE technicians (
    technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50),
    technician_specialty VARCHAR(50)
)
